languages.text: {n}Офицер переводит дух.{/n} "Как изволите, Ваша Светлость". {n}По знаку офицера другие стражи почтительно расступаются, открывая вам проход к двери.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Офицер переводит дух.{/n} "Как изволите, Ваше Благородие". {n}По знаку офицера другие гвардейцы почтительно расступаются, открывая вам проход к двери.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The officer takes a breath.{/n} "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. {n}At the officer's signal, the other wardens take a deferential step back, clearing your path to the door.{/n}

languages.text: {n}将校は一呼吸置く。{/n}「陛下の仰せのままに」{n}将校の合図で他のワーデンたちが慇懃な足取りで下がり、扉までの道が開く。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The officer takes a breath.{/n} "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. {n}At the officer's signal, the other wardens take a deferential step back, clearing your path to the door.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}将校は一呼吸置く。{/n}「陛下の仰せのままに」{n}将校の合図で他のワーデンたちが慇懃な足取りで下がり、扉までの道が開く。{/n}

languages.text: {n}军官深吸一口气。{/n}“如您所愿，大人。”{n}在军官的示意下，其他守卫恭敬地退后一步，为你让出了通往门口的道路。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The officer takes a breath.{/n} "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. {n}At the officer's signal, the other wardens take a deferential step back, clearing your path to the door.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}军官深吸一口气。{/n}“如您所愿，大人。”{n}在军官的示意下，其他守卫恭敬地退后一步，为你让出了通往门口的道路。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El oficial da un suspiro.{/n} «A sus órdenes, {mf|milord|milady}». {n}Cuando el oficial da la señal, los demás guardias dan un paso atrás con sumo respeto, despejando así el paso hasta la puerta.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The officer takes a breath.{/n} "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. {n}At the officer's signal, the other wardens take a deferential step back, clearing your path to the door.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El oficial da un suspiro.{/n} «A sus órdenes, {mf|milord|milady}». {n}Cuando el oficial da la señal, los demás guardias dan un paso atrás con sumo respeto, despejando así el paso hasta la puerta.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Offizier atmet tief durch.{/n} "Wie Ihr wünscht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. {n}Auf ein Signal des Offiziers treten die anderen Wächter respektvoll einen Schritt zurück und machen dir den Weg zur Tür frei.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The officer takes a breath.{/n} "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. {n}At the officer's signal, the other wardens take a deferential step back, clearing your path to the door.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Offizier atmet tief durch.{/n} "Wie Ihr wünscht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. {n}Auf ein Signal des Offiziers treten die anderen Wächter respektvoll einen Schritt zurück und machen dir den Weg zur Tür frei.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'officier prend une profonde inspiration.{/n} « Comme il vous plaira, Votre Seigneurie. » {n}Sur un signe de l'officier, les autres gardiens font un pas en arrière pour vous laisser accéder à la porte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The officer takes a breath.{/n} "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. {n}At the officer's signal, the other wardens take a deferential step back, clearing your path to the door.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'officier prend une profonde inspiration.{/n} « Comme il vous plaira, Votre Seigneurie. » {n}Sur un signe de l'officier, les autres gardiens font un pas en arrière pour vous laisser accéder à la porte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Subay nefes alıyor.{/n} "Nasıl isterseniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. {n}Subayın işaretiyle diğer dizdarlar da itaatkâr bir şekilde geri çekiliyor, kapıya doğru olan yolu açıyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The officer takes a breath.{/n} "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. {n}At the officer's signal, the other wardens take a deferential step back, clearing your path to the door.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Subay nefes alıyor.{/n} "Nasıl isterseniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. {n}Subayın işaretiyle diğer muhafızlar itaatkâr bir şekilde geri çekiliyor, kapıya doğru olan yolu açıyorlar.{/n}
